name: cris_virtualsource_orcid
label: ORCID Id (only for EPFL members with EPFL linked ORCID)
label-fr: Identifiant ORCID ((only for EPFL members with EPFL linked ORCID)

name: dc_relation_journal
label: Journal title
range_label: String or Journal authority or Sherpa Romeo Registry

name: dc_relation_ispartof
label: Book Title or Is part of or Source name

name: dc_relation_ispartofseries
label: Series title/Series vol.
label-fr: Titre de la série/Numéro de la série

name: dc_size
label: Main content size, duration or Page count

name: dc_audience
label: Target audience
range_values: Bachelor, Master, PhD school, General audience

name: epfl_writtenAt
label: Written while being affiliated with EPFL
label-fr: Rédigé en étant affilié à l'EPFL

name: epfl_award_date
label: Award date
label-fr: Date du prix ou de la récompense

name: dspace_file_type
label: File type
range_values: main document,main dataset,supplementary material/Information,presentation,video recording,audio recording,poster,figures,source code,readme,raw data,anonymized data,processed data,figures,thumbnail,other

name: oaire_licenseCondition
label: File License
range_values: N/A,CC BY,CC BY-SA,CC BY-ND,CC BY-NC,CC BY-NC-SA,CC BY-NC-ND,CC0,PDM,ODbL,ODC-By,PDDL,MIT,Apache,BSD 3-Clause,GNU GPLv3,GNU LGPLv3,GNU AGPLv3

name: oaire_version
label: File version
range_values: Submitted version (Preprint),Accepted version,Published version,Corrected Version ,Not Applicable (or Unknown)
